event.title: IU Games Summit
event.body: !format (( Want to learn what IU student organizations have to offer? Join us for the 2018 IU Games Summit! Hosted by Gamedev@IU and the CEWiT Game Design SIG, the summit will feature a variety of student-run organizations focused on designing, developing, and playing games. Be sure to come out and learn what's going on this semester! ))
